sys_remote_update_set.description: Assert that the field definition (type, mandatory, etc.) matches expectations. E.g. "Assert that 'number' is mandatory and read-only in 'x_app_table'."
sys_remote_update_set.name: TestStep_AssertTableFieldDefinition_FM

sys_update_xml.name: sys_atf_step_config_872084efc3f222103a2ebfddd401313f
sys_update_xml.payload:
truefalse317c4dc20b202200a8d7a12cf6673aa8scriptfalse"; if (typeof val === "boolean") return val ? "true" : "false"; if (Array.isArray(val)) return val.length > 0 ? val.join(", ") : ""; return val.toString(); } var tableName = step.inputs.u_table_name || ""; var fieldName = step.inputs.u_field_name || ""; var expectedType = step.inputs.u_field_type || ""; var expectedMaxLength = step.inputs.u_max_length || ""; var expectedMandatory = step.inputs.u_mandatory; var expectedReadOnly = step.inputs.u_read_only; var expectedReference = step.inputs.u_reference_table || ""; var expectedReferenceQualifier = step.inputs.u_reference_qualifier || ""; var expectedChoices = step.inputs.u_allowed_choices ? step.inputs.u_allowed_choices.split(",").map(function(s){ return s.trim(); }) : []; var expectedChoiceField = step.inputs.u_choice_field || ""; var expectedChoiceTable = step.inputs.u_choice_table || ""; var numberPrefix = step.inputs.u_number_prefix || ""; var numberMaxDigits = step.inputs.u_number_max_digits || ""; var numberStart = step.inputs.u_number_start_number || ""; var desc = "Assert that field '" + fieldName + "' on table '" + tableName + "' matches the following expected properties:"; var lines = []; if (expectedType) lines.push(" Type: " + show(expectedType)); if (expectedMaxLength) lines.push(" Max Length: " + show(expectedMaxLength)); if (expectedMandatory !== undefined && expectedMandatory !== "") lines.push(" Mandatory: " + show(expectedMandatory)); if (expectedReadOnly !== undefined && expectedReadOnly !== "") lines.push(" Read Only: " + show(expectedReadOnly)); if (expectedReference) lines.push(" Reference Table: " + show(expectedReference)); if (expectedChoices.length > 0) lines.push(" Allowed Choices: " + show(expectedChoices)); if (numberPrefix) lines.push(" Number Prefix: " + show(numberPrefix)); if (numberMaxDigits) lines.push(" Number Max Digits: " + show(numberMaxDigits)); if (numberStart) lines.push(" Number Start Value: " + show(numberStart)); if (lines.length > 0) desc += "\n" + lines.join("\n"); else desc += "\n "; return desc; })(step);]]><p>
<b>Validate the dictionary definition of a single field on a specified table.</b><br/>
<b>Example use case:</b> Ensure the field "number" on table "x_app_table" is mandatory, read-only, of type "string", and has the correct reference or allowed choices.<br/>
<b>How to use:</b> Set the table and field name, specify each property to assert (type, mandatory, reference, max length, read-only, choices), and provide expected values as needed. Leave optional inputs blank to skip that check.
</p>

]]>icon-article-documentAssert Table Field Definition5300false6c2bcea1870312009dccc9ded0e3ecca expectedMaxLength) { errorMessages.push("Max length exceeds expectation: expected <= " + expectedMaxLength + ", actual " + actualMaxLength); } // 4. Mandatory check var actualMandatory = isTrue(dictGR.getValue('mandatory')); if (actualMandatory !== expectedMandatory) { errorMessages.push("Mandatory mismatch: expected '" + expectedMandatory + "', actual '" + actualMandatory + "'"); } // 5. Read-only check var actualReadOnly = isTrue(dictGR.getValue('read_only')); if (actualReadOnly !== expectedReadOnly) { errorMessages.push("Read only mismatch: expected '" + expectedReadOnly + "', actual '" + actualReadOnly + "'"); } // 6. Reference check var actualReference = dictGR.getValue('reference'); if (actualReference && actualReference !== expectedReference) { errorMessages.push("Reference mismatch: expected '" + expectedReference + "', actual '" + actualReference + "'"); } // 7. Reference qualifier check var actualReferenceQualifier = dictGR.getValue('reference_qual'); if (actualReferenceQualifier && actualReferenceQualifier !== expectedReferenceQualifier) { errorMessages.push("Reference qualifier mismatch: expected '" + expectedReferenceQualifier + "', actual '" + actualReferenceQualifier + "'"); } // 8. Choice field check var actualChoiceField = dictGR.getValue('choice_field'); if (actualChoiceField && actualChoiceField !== expectedChoiceField) { errorMessages.push("Choice field mismatch: expected '" + expectedChoiceField + "', actual '" + actualChoiceField + "'"); } // 9. Choice table check var actualChoiceTable = dictGR.getValue('choice_table'); if (actualChoiceTable && actualChoiceTable !== expectedChoiceTable) { errorMessages.push("Choice table mismatch: expected '" + expectedChoiceTable + "', actual '" + actualChoiceTable + "'"); } // 10. Choices check var choicesSummary = ""; if (expectedChoices.length > 0) { var choiceGR = new GlideRecord("sys_choice"); choiceGR.addQuery("name", tableName); choiceGR.addQuery("element", fieldName); choiceGR.addQuery("inactive", "false"); choiceGR.query(); var actualChoices = []; while (choiceGR.next()) { actualChoices.push(choiceGR.value.toString().toLowerCase()); } expectedChoices.forEach(function(val) { if (actualChoices.indexOf(val.toLowerCase()) === -1) { errorMessages.push("Choice value missing: '" + val + "'"); } }); choicesSummary = "\nChoices: expected=[" + expectedChoices.join(", ") + "]" + "\n actual=[" + actualChoices.join(", ") + "]"; } // 11. Number maintenance (sys_number) check (for "number"-style fields) var numberSummary = ""; var numberChecks = []; var wantsNumberCheck = (expectedNumberPrefix && expectedNumberPrefix !== "") || (expectedNumberMaxDigits && !isNaN(expectedNumberMaxDigits)) || (expectedNumberStartNumber && !isNaN(expectedNumberStartNumber)); if (wantsNumberCheck) { var numRefGR = new GlideRecord("sys_number"); numRefGR.addQuery("category", tableName); numRefGR.query(); if (numRefGR.next()) { // Prefix if (expectedNumberPrefix && expectedNumberPrefix !== "") { var actualPrefix = numRefGR.getValue("prefix") || ""; if (expectedNumberPrefix !== actualPrefix) { errorMessages.push("Number prefix mismatch: expected '" + expectedNumberPrefix + "', actual '" + actualPrefix + "'"); } numberChecks.push("Prefix: expected='" + expectedNumberPrefix + "', actual='" + actualPrefix + "'"); } // Max digits if (expectedNumberMaxDigits && !isNaN(expectedNumberMaxDigits)) { var actualMaxDigits = numRefGR.getValue("maximum_digits") ? parseInt(numRefGR.getValue("maximum_digits"), 10) : null; if (expectedNumberMaxDigits !== actualMaxDigits) { errorMessages.push("Number maximum_digits mismatch: expected '" + expectedNumberMaxDigits + "', actual '" + actualMaxDigits + "'"); } numberChecks.push("Max Digits: expected='" + expectedNumberMaxDigits + "', actual='" + actualMaxDigits + "'"); } // Start number if (expectedNumberStartNumber && !isNaN(expectedNumberStartNumber)) { var actualStart = numRefGR.getValue("number") ? parseInt(numRefGR.getValue("number"), 10) : null; if (expectedNumberStartNumber !== actualStart) { errorMessages.push("Number start_number mismatch: expected '" + expectedNumberStartNumber + "', actual '" + actualStart + "'"); } numberChecks.push("Start Number: expected='" + expectedNumberStartNumber + "', actual='" + actualStart + "'"); } } else { errorMessages.push("No sys_number configuration found for table '" + tableName + "'."); } // Prepare a one-line summary (even if nothing failed) if (numberChecks.length > 0) { numberSummary = "\nNumber Config: " + numberChecks.join("; "); } } // 12. Report result var summary = "\n--- Summary of Checks ---" + "\nField Name: " + fieldName + "\nField Type: expected='" + expectedType + "', actual='" + actualType + "'" + "\nMandatory: expected='" + expectedMandatory + "', actual='" + actualMandatory + "'" + "\nMax Length: expected='" + expectedMaxLength + "', actual='" + actualMaxLength + "'" + "\nReference: expected='" + expectedReference + "', actual='" + actualReference + "'" + "\nReference qualifier: expected='" + expectedReferenceQualifier + "', actual='" + actualReferenceQualifier + "'" + "\nChoice field: expected='" + expectedChoiceField + "', actual='" + actualChoiceField + "'" + "\nChoice table: expected='" + expectedChoiceTable + "', actual='" + actualChoiceTable + "'" + "\nRead Only: expected='" + expectedReadOnly + "', actual='" + actualReadOnly + "'" + choicesSummary + numberSummary; if (errorMessages.length > 0) { stepResult.setOutputMessage( "Validation errors for table '" + tableName + "':\n" + errorMessages.join("\n") + "\n\n" + debugMessages.join("\n") + summary ); stepResult.setFailed(); } else { stepResult.setOutputMessage("All assertions passed for " + tableName + "." + fieldName + ".\n" + debugMessages.join("\n") + summary); stepResult.setSuccess(); } } catch (e) { stepResult.setOutputMessage("Exception occurred: " + e.message); stepResult.setFailed(); } })(inputs, outputs, stepResult);]]>sys_atf_step_configadmin2025-07-23 10:47:28872084efc3f222103a2ebfddd401313f31Assert Table Field Definitionglobalglobalsys_atf_step_config_872084efc3f222103a2ebfddd401313fadmin2025-07-28 13:46:09Assert that the field definition (type, mandatory, etc.) matches expectations. E.g. "Assert that 'number' is mandatory and read-only in 'x_app_table'."35ff02f778e022104f3459503ff42af0872084efc3f222103a2ebfddd401313fadmin2025-07-23 10:47:2741610c6fc3f222103a2ebfddd401317c0admin2025-07-23 10:47:27
